info.name: ToDo API - Public
info.description:
A simple API for managing personal task lists.  
This API allows users to create lists, add tasks, and manage their status.

**Documentation & References:**

- [Project Requirements](https://github.com/AdamSpalt/todo-list-api/blob/main/docs/REQUIREMENTS.md)
    

**Key Features:**

- Create, Read, Update, Delete (CRUD) Lists
    
- Manage Tasks within Lists
    
- Filter by Status
    

Contact Support:  
Name: Adam Spaltenstein  
Email: [adam.spaltenstein@gmail.com](https://mailto:adam.spaltenstein@gmail.com)

item.name: View a specific To-Do list (User Story 3)

request.description:
Returns full details of a specific list.
**Rule:** Returns 404 if list does not exist OR is 'Deleted'.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: List not found or is Deleted

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Update or Defer a To-Do list (User Story 4 & 5)

request.description:
Updates list details (Title, Description) or Status.

**Deferral Logic (Story 5):**
*   If updating `status` to 'Deferred', the system checks for 'In-Progress' tasks.
*   If 'In-Progress' tasks exist, returns **409 Conflict**.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: List not found or is Deleted

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Conflict - Cannot defer list with 'In-Progress' tasks

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

request.description:
Changes status to 'Deleted'.

**Validation Rule:**
*   Cannot delete if tasks are NOT 'Completed' or 'Deferred'.
*   Returns **409 Conflict** if active tasks exist.
*   Returns **204** if successful (Idempotent).

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Conflict - Cannot delete list with active tasks

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

request.description:
Returns details of a specific task.
**Rule:** Returns 404 if Task OR Parent List is 'Deleted'.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Task or Parent List not found/deleted

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Update or Defer a Task (User Story 10 & 11)

request.description:
Updates task details or status.

**Validation Rules:**
*   **Story 10:** Cannot set status to 'New' -> Returns **400**.
*   **Story 10/11:** Cannot update if Parent List is 'Deleted' or 'Deferred' -> Returns **409**.
*   **Story 10:** Cannot update if Task is 'Deferred' -> Returns **404** (Hidden).

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Invalid status transition (e.g., back to New)

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Task/List not found or is Deleted/Deferred

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

request.description:
Changes task status to 'Deleted'.
Returns **204** if successful.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Task or Parent List not found

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: View all tasks in a list (User Story 9)

variable.description: (Required) The UUID of the parent list

request.description:
Returns a list of all tasks in the specified list.
**Rule:** Excludes tasks with status 'Deleted'.
**Rule:** Returns 404 if the Parent List does not exist or is 'Deleted'.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Parent List not found or is Deleted

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

variable.description: (Required) The UUID of the parent list

request.description:
Adds a new task to the list.
*   **Default Status:** 'New'
*   **Required:** Title

**Validation Rules:**
*   Returns **409 Conflict** if Parent List is 'Deleted' or 'Deferred'.
*   Returns **400** if Title is missing.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

response.name: Conflict - Parent List is Deleted or Deferred

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Retrieve all active To-Do lists (User Story 2)

request.description:
Returns a list of all lists that are not in 'Deleted' status.
If no lists exist, returns an empty list.

response.name: A list of To-Do lists (or empty list)

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Create a new To-Do list (User Story 1)

request.description:
Creates a new list.
*   **Default Status:** 'Active'
*   **Required:** Title
